attention3.ptxt: Vehicle information with asterisk (*) below are not applicable to vehicle without diesel particulate filter.

item.ptxt: If ECM is replaced with new one or a substituted one, the engine cannot be started unless the key verification code stored in ECM is registered in the immobilizer control system.
Also, the following vehicle information should be registered in ECM in addition of the key verification code according to Registration Procedure for the ECM:F9Q .
If ECM is replaced with new or substituted one without the function of the immobilizer control system, the engine will not be started.
In case of the above-mentioned, check if the newly installed ECM has the function of the immobilizer control system referring to its part number.
